com.cs309.loginscreen.Presenter

Class VerificationPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs309.loginscreen.Presenter.VerificationPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerListener

    public class VerificationPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerListener
    Presenter for the Verification view Object. It handles the server requests for verification, and it implements the IServerListener to listen to the server response. It can verify the user, sending back success of precise error messages, or it can add the user as a new user.

      • verifyUser

        public void verifyUser(java.lang.String userName,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Verify the user with the given user name and password. It sends the combined info to server via String Request using ServerRequest model
        Parameters:
        userName - - user name
        password - - password

      • signUp

        public void signUp(java.lang.String userName,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Adds the user as a new user. Sends this new user request to Server via String Request using ServerRequest model.
        Parameters:
        userName - - user name
        password - - password

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(java.lang.String s)
        Server request listener. It listens and passes on the success message from the server. *** NOTE *** mListener's OnSuccess is called IF AND ONLY IF server has verified that the user name and passwords are correct, or the user is added as a new user. If verification failed, then it calls mListener's onFailure method. If server returns connection error or other communication errors, this method will not be called.
        Specified by:
        onSuccess in interface IServerListener
        Parameters:
        s - - string of success message

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(org.json.JSONArray jArr)
        This method is not handled. This object does not expect a JSON Array response.
        Specified by:
        onSuccess in interface IServerListener
        Parameters:
        jArr - - JSON array object

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(org.json.JSONObject jObj)
        This method is not handled. This object does not expect a JSON Object response.
        Specified by:
        onSuccess in interface IServerListener
        Parameters:
        jObj - - JSON object

      • onError

        public void onError(java.lang.String s)
        This method is called if there is connection error with the server. However, it is not implemented at the time, as the server already has error logs, and the ServerRequest object has verbose error log system as well.
        Specified by:
        onError in interface IServerListener
        Parameters:
        s - - string of error message
